oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: George McInturff affidavit, 1960 July 10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mcinturff, George L., 1907-1986
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Affidavit of commissioner and vice mayor of Chattanooga, Tennessee arguing that the citizens of Chattanooga are not ready for public school desegregation.
